title: Pea Pod
description:
A green pea pod split to reveal a row of peas inside.

Can be used to talk about actual pea pods or peas, pods or vegetables in general, or the color green. May be used along with the phrase two peas in a pod.
apple_vendor_description: The pea pod emoji on Apple devices showcases a plump, bright green pod, gently curved and bursting with character. Appleâ€™s signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a delightful, tactile appearance, with subtle highlights suggesting the roundness of the peas nestled within. This charming representation of nature's bounty is often used to convey growth, new beginnings, or a healthy, wholesome element in messages.
